account_data_map.strategic_priority_summary: Unilever is focused on delivering its full-year outlook for 2025, with a balance between volume and price growth. The company is prioritizing investments in its power brands, premium innovations, and digital commerce, while maintaining operational excellence and driving margin resilience.
account_data_map.risk_summary:
• Inflationary pressures from commodities and currency
• Weakening economic conditions in Latin America, particularly in Brazil and Mexico
• Uncertain macro and currency environment
